Desc.entry: An organisation for parents in Broomhall which aims to advocate for better youth provision which can impact upon the 5 "every Child Matters" outcomes. Networks with parents in other parts of the city to address anti-social behaviour and youth conflict. Organises activities. Open to any parent in Broomhall with children aged 0-19 years.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Fortnightly or Monthly, please contact for details

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
